messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for app-related inquiries.
The discounted offer is not showing on MTA?
Why can't I see the discount offer on my Telenor app?
What to do if a promo offer isn't appearing in the My Telenor App?
Please update your My Telenor app and check it again. If the issue persists, please contact our helpline 345 (UAN number 042111345100).
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for app-related inquiries.
I am unable to claim free MBs through MTA, what should I do?
Can't claim free MBs on My Telenor App, how to fix this?
What steps should I take if I'm unable to redeem free MBs in the app?
Please update your My Telenor app and check it again. If the issue persists, please contact our helpline 345 (UAN number 042111345100).
